title: 3 and Out - Trevor Lawrence 'Love of the Game' Debate; Top QB Takes; Draft Nuggets; Alex Smith Thoughts; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Trevor Lawrence 'Love of the Game' Debate; Top QB Takes; Draft Nuggets; Alex Smith Thoughts; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John discusses the continued debate surrounding Trevor Lawrence's love of football, shares some draft nuggets he's focusing with a week until the Jags are on the clock. He also tips the cap to Alex Smith after his retirement announcement and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
